title: Cajun Style Chicken Breast
directions: In a mixing bowl, add all the herbs and spices, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, smoked paprika, thyme, oregano, white pepper and salt. Mix well.
Coat the chicken breasts in olive oil, ensure they are completely coated. Place the chicken breasts into the mixed spice mixing bowl and coat evenly.
In an oven proof frying pan on low heat, add the chicken breast top side down (smooth side) and sear for 2 minutes. Flip over and repeat. Place in oven and cook for approx. 20 minutes.
Once cooked, remove from oven and leave to rest in frying pan for 10 minutes. Slice and serve immediately.
